text.text_translated:
Chloe has two pet rats. Their names are Zena and Roxy.
Chloe knows that rats are not normal pets. Many people think rats are dirty. Chloe often explains that this is not true. She says rats are fantastic pets if you look after them well.
But she understands why people do not like them. She did not like rats before. Then her friend Martin showed her his pet rats. She saw they were friendly and smart.
Last year, one of Martin's rats had babies. Chloe decided she wanted to have two of them.
